originalText.text: Elliot's physical therapy has been invaluable for a family member suffering from chronic neck and back pain.  The quality of life has improved greatly thanks to the exercises that he gave, unlike many other PTs that we tried in the past. If he is busy, his team is great too. Highly recommend!

text.text: Elliot's physical therapy has been invaluable for a family member suffering from chronic neck and back pain.  The quality of life has improved greatly thanks to the exercises that he gave, unlike many other PTs that we tried in the past. If he is busy, his team is great too. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: By far and way a revolution for pain relief. The manual therapy is so specific to concerns and the science of releasing, aligning and reeducating the body’s imbalances and weaknesses is a completely different level compared to conventional PT. Other PT has been largely ineffective and does not examine how different parts of our body are all connected and finding the root causes. After 1 session with Alison at kinected I walk away with significantly less pain and was provided a clear understanding of my body. I wish I had found her sooner!

originalText.text: Alison is a fantastic PT. I tried a number of other physical therapists and styles of PT before I lucked into her, and none of them correctly diagnosed the problem I was having, nor could they treat it. I finally got the care and medical advice I needed with Alison. She is nothing less than masterful. She took her time getting a thorough understanding of my symptoms and offered expert advice that clearly came from a well of deep knowledge. I went to appointments in pain and always left feeling significant relief. I tried for years to get adequate care for the pain and neurological problems I’ve got, and Alison’s treatment and advice was a huge turning point. I recommend her highly.

originalText.text: Elliot is incredibly knowledgable. He takes time and is passionate about his work. I always felt like I was receiving exceptional care and that he was invested in helping me achieve my personal goals. Without a doubt I would recommend Elliot and his colleagues to anyone looking to receive Physical Therapy.

I always felt like I was receiving exceptional care and that he was invested in helping me achieve my personal goals. originalText.text: This is a review for Kinected's PT services. I have done many rounds of PTs in recent years. I am fully committed to exercise and do the PTs' prescribed exercises. Unfortunately, the 6 rounds of PT I have done w/other professionals in the past have been a waste of time. My Pilates instructor (who works at Kinected) recommended Elliot Fishbein very highly. While my partner was unemployed, I was unable to try him out, since he does not accept insurance. This year, I was fortunate to find the time and resources to work with Elliot. He has been instrumental in helping me live a mostly, relatively pain-free life. He started by making common sense recommendations regarding my supplements, medications, and exercise. Then he worked on getting my bones back into alignment. He gave me discrete but impactful exercises along with personalized videos. I started to see real improvement after just a few sessions. He has been the only bodywork specialist who has been able to help with some tough-to-heal areas of the body. Going to Kinected and being able to see Elliot have definitely been worth it. I feel very fortunate. The staff at Kinected are very professional, and they are very skilled at scheduling and processing superbills for insurance.
